summary: The diff shows only documentation updates (project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt) and hook type imports (useQueries.ts). No actual implementation changes are present. All 10 requirements remain unverified as the diff contains no functional code changes to creative tools, DTF gallery, admin dashboard, licensing system, payment processing, legal pages, branding components, or embed widgets.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify all AI-powered creative tools are functional: coloring page generator, affirmation creator, meme creator, and DTF artwork generator in the Creative Studio
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to creative tool components or Creative Studio page implementation

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure DTF gallery and store are fully operational with upload, preview, purchase, and download functionality
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to DTF gallery components, UploadDtfModal, or DTF-related pages

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify admin dashboard includes all management features: uploads, licensing approvals, royalties tracking, and analytics metrics
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to admin dashboard components or AdminUploadContentModal

missing_requirements.requirement: Confirm licensing and royalty automation is synchronized between backend and frontend with proper consent workflow
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to LicensingConsentModal, LicensingBadge, or licensing-related pages

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify embedded checkout links are functional and properly integrated with Stripe payment processing
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to ContentDetailPage, PaymentSuccessPage, PaymentFailurePage, or Stripe checkout implementation

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure privacy policy is accessible and complete with all required legal sections
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to LegalPrivacyPage component or privacy policy content

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify optimized branding is consistently applied across all pages including logos, colors, typography, and animated interactive buttons
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to branding components, AnimatedButton, Header, Footer, or styling files beyond documentation

missing_requirements.requirement: Confirm all essential legal pages are complete and accessible: Terms of Service, Copyright Notice, Refund Policy, and Privacy Policy
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to legal page components or footer navigation links

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify production checklist validates all critical configurations: Stripe setup, SEO metadata, environment settings, and admin permissions
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to ProductionChecklistPage or validation logic

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure embeddable widgets are functional and properly adapt when loaded in iframe contexts
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to EmbedWidget component or iframe detection logic
